text: Jacqueline France "Jackie" Stallone (born Jacqueline France Labofish November 29, 1921 - September 21 2020) was an American astrologer who was mostly known for being the mother of Sylvester Stallone, Frank Stallone, Jr., and her late daughter Toni D'Alto. Her family was from Ukraine. She was born in Washington, D.C., United States on November 29, 1921. She was married to Frank Stallone, Sr. from 1945 until they divorced in 1957. Second she married Anthony Filti from 1959 until they divorced in 1980. She was married to Stephen Lavine from 1998 until her death. She was also the grandmother of late actor Sage Stallone. Stallone died on September 21, 2020 in Los Angeles at the age of 98.Sylvester Stallone's Mother, Jackie Stallone, Dead at 98 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1921 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American esotericists Category:Astrologers Category:Scientists from Washington, D.C.
title: Jackie Stallone
